title: SKT T1 Skins
body: Unfortunately, I wasn't playing League back when SKT T1 won the 2014 Championships meaning that I didn't have the opportunity to buy the skins for them. So, I was wondering if Riot will release the skins again during the 2015 Championships. Thanks.

replies.body: Correction, SKT T1 won the 2013 worlds. SSW won 2014.
So sorry my good sir. Got them mixed up lol.

My good sir I belive that you are in luck. Riot anounced that they will open the vault during the mid season invatational, around 2 weeks from now I belive , and you will be able to buy the SKT skins, Fnatic skins and the TPA skins. Enjoy your skins
They came back during last year's World Championships, so there's a good chance they'll come back again during that time. :]

On a side note TPA skins were also available during the time when the SKT skins were first released during All-Stars. So assuming that the SSW skins will be available soon, summoners will probably have a chance during MSI to get past team skins if tradition runs its course.
Yeah, they announced not long ago on the Esports site that they'd be re-released in May during one of the events that's coming up.
